summary:
Fear and awe
<br />
<br />in your eyes
<br />
<br />showing you what you can't see
<br />
<br />reaching hands, you are blind
<br />
<br />staring down eternity
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that replaces the dragon combat music with "Eternity" from Blue Dragon, thereby improving dragon fights infinitely.
<br />
<br />You're welcome.
author: Lizard Wizard
